i.title: Favourite this theatre for quick access!

div.p: 10 Dundas Street East, Suite 402 , Toronto, ON, M5B 2G9

div.p: Remember, printing a paper ticket is no longer required. Scan your eTickets from your phone with the ticket taker. To avoid data charges, you can download your eTickets to your device before heading to the theatre.

div.title: 'No passes' means that Cineplex 'Be Our Guest' passes and any Free Admission Coupons will not be accepted towards Cineplex admission tickets. This does not include Gift Cards or any pre-paid corporate products such as Cineplex 'Night Out' or 'Admit One' vouchers, which will be accepted for admission.
